trans-unit.source: Represents a line annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示線條註解。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position alignment of an annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解相對於錨點的對齊位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> value that represents the annotation alignment to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值，表示註解對齊錨點的方式。

trans-unit.source: The annotation must be anchored using either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 註解必須使用儘管<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>屬性必須設為<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 不應該在內部使用。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the end of the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解線條結尾之錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> enumeration value that represents the style to apply to the anchor cap at the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> 列舉值，表示線條結尾的錨點端點所要套用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether an infinite line should be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標表示是否應該繪製無限長的線條。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if a line should be drawn infinitely through two points provided, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應透過提供的兩點繪製無限長的線條則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會指定是否一律以相對圖表座標來定義註解的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height" /> of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果註解的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height" /> 一定會以相對圖表座標表示，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The width and height of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在相對的圖表或軸座標可能設定的註解高度與寬度。

trans-unit.source: By default, relative chart coordinates are used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會使用相對圖表座標。

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates for the annotation size, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的註解大小的軸座標，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 然後錨定至資料點的註解或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a style for the anchor cap at the start of an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解線條開始之錨點端點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> enumeration value that represents the style to apply to the anchor cap at the start of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> 列舉值，表示線條開始的錨點端點所要套用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to the line annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性不適用於線條註解類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextStyle" /> 列舉值。
